description: India News: NEW DELHI: A woman Naxal was Tuesday gunned down in an encounter with security forces in Chhattisgarh’s Sukma district, police said.
title: Woman Maoist gunned down in Sukma
title_page: Woman Maoist gunned down in Sukma | India News - Times of India
text: NEW DELHI: A woman Naxal was Tuesday gunned down in an encounter with security forces in Chhattisgarh’s Sukma district , police said. The firefight took place in the afternoon near Burdhapara village when security personnel were out on an anti-Naxal operation, DIG (Anti-Naxal Operation) Sundarraj P SAID.The woman ultra, identified as Hemla Ayathi, was a member of Badesetti local organisation squad of Maoists. Her body was recovered from the spot, he said.
